attributes.action: Ban EDL showing 'Anti-Islam' film at their demonstrations
attributes.additional_details:
Recently a film that had been specifically made to target Muslims around the world had been made by a small group of islamophobic individuals.

The film had caused an absolute uproar amongst the Islamic communities around the world which resulted in protests and violence in retaliation to this vile film.

The majority and true Muslims are against any sort of violence and as much as this film has upset millions , we should protest in peace.

EDL a right wing fascist group are planning to show this film on every single demonstration of theirs which will be held in various towns where the Muslim community has a large presence.

Let's stop the hate the violence and importantly let's stop the EDL from inviting trouble.

My community is your community is our community.

Peace
